'use client' import React, { useState } from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import Image from 'next/image' import { advisorSteps, getRecommendation, AdvisorOption, Recommendation } from '@/app/data/advisorLogic' import { ShieldAlert, ScanFace, Eye, Flame, Wallet, Briefcase, Gem, ArrowRight, CheckCircle2, Loader2, RefreshCcw, ChevronRight } from 'lucide-react' // Icon mapping helper const iconMap: Record = { Home: , Building2: , Factory: , Users2: , Tractor: , ShieldAlert: , ScanFace: , Eye: , Flame: , Wallet: , Briefcase: , Gem: , } export default function AIAdvisorPage() { const [currentStepIndex, setCurrentStepIndex] = useState(-1) // -1 is Welcome screen const [answers, setAnswers] = useState>({}) const [isAnalyzing, setIsAnalyzing] = useState(false) const [result, setResult] = useState(null) const currentStep = advisorSteps[currentStepIndex] const totalSteps = advisorSteps.length const handleStart = () => setCurrentStepIndex(0) const handleOptionSelect = (optionValue: string) => { const stepId = currentStep.id const newAnswers = { ...answers, [stepId]: optionValue } setAnswers(newAnswers) if (currentStepIndex < totalSteps - 1) { // Next Step setTimeout(() => setCurrentStepIndex(prev => prev + 1), 250) // Slight delay for visual feedback } else { // Finish / Analyze setIsAnalyzing(true) setTimeout(() => { const rec = getRecommendation(newAnswers) setResult(rec) setIsAnalyzing(false) }, 2000) // Fake analysis delay } } const handleReset = () => { setResult(null) setAnswers({}) setCurrentStepIndex(-1) } // --- RENDERERS --- // 1. WELCOME SCREEN if (currentStepIndex === -1) { return (
{/* Background FX */}
AI SECURITY SYSTEM V2.0

Security Advisor

Unsure what you need? Let our intelligent advisor analyze your property type, risks, and budget to recommend the perfect security strategy.

) } // 2. ANALYSIS SCREEN if (isAnalyzing) { return (

Analyzing Requirements...

Comparing your inputs against 50+ security configurations.

) } // 3. RESULT SCREEN if (result) { return (
ANALYSIS COMPLETE

Security Strategy Report

We've analyzed your requirements and generated a tailored security profile.

{/* Main Strategy Card */}
{/* Dog Ear Accent */}

{result.title}

{result.priority} Package Est. Install: {result.timeline}
{/* The "Why" */}

Strategic Reasoning

{result.reasoning}

{/* Risk Analysis */}

Vulnerability Assessment

{result.riskAnalysis}

{/* Recommended Services Grid */}

Recommended Hardware & Services

{result.suggestedServices.map((service, idx) => (
{service}
))}
{/* Sidebar: Cost & Action */}
{/* Estimated Cost Card */}

Estimated Investment

{result.estimatedCost}

*Includes hardware & labor

Key Benefits
    {result.keyBenefits.map((benefit, i) => (
  • {benefit}
    • ))}
{/* Action Buttons */}

Ready to implement this strategy?

Get Official Quote
) } // 4. WIZARD STEPS return (
{/* Header / Progress */}
Step {currentStepIndex + 1} of {totalSteps}
{/* Progress Bar */}
{/* Question Area */}

{currentStep.question}

{currentStep.options.map((option: AdvisorOption) => ( ))}
{/* Step Navigation Hint */}
Select an option to proceed
) }

import locationData from '@/app/data/locationData.json' import seoData from '@/app/data/seoData.json' import { ContactForm } from '@/components/ContactForm' import { notFound } from 'next/navigation' import Link from 'next/link' import { ArrowLeft } from 'lucide-react' import type { Metadata } from 'next' // Helper to find location const getLocation = (slug: string) => { return locationData.find(l => l.slug === slug) } // Helper to normalize string to slug const toSlug = (text: string) => { return text.toLowerCase().replace(/[^\w\s-]/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '-').trim() } export async function generateMetadata(props: { params: Promise<{ slug: string }> }): Promise { const params = await props.params const location = getLocation(params.slug) // Try to find exact match in seoData for superior SEO title/description const seoItem = seoData.serviceAreaPages.find(p => toSlug(p.page) === params.slug) || seoData.serviceAreaPages.find(p => p.page.toLowerCase().includes(location?.suburb.toLowerCase() || '')) if (seoItem) { return { title: seoItem.title, description: seoItem.description } } if (!location) return {} return { title: location.h1, description: location.description, } } // Ensure params are correctly awaited in Next.js 15+ compatible way if needed, strict TS might complain about params type. // But current type { params: { slug: string } } is standard. export default async function AreaPage(props: { params: Promise<{ slug: string }> }) { const params = await props.params const location = getLocation(params.slug) if (!location) { notFound() } return (
Back to Areas

{location.h1}

{/* Main Content */}

{location.description}

{location.localContent}

At Global Security Solutions, we understand the specific security challenges faced by residents and businesses in {location.suburb}. Our team of certified technicians provides rapid response and expert installation of:

  • Alarm Systems: Smart detection and 24/7 monitoring compatibility.
  • CCTV Surveillance: HD cameras with remote viewing on your phone.
  • Electric Fencing: COC-certified perimeter protection.
  • Access Control: Secure entry for homes and complexes.

Protect your property in {location.suburb} today. Contact us for a free security assessment.

Why Choose Us in {location.suburb}?

We have a dedicated team servicing the {location.suburb} area, ensuring fast turnaround times for installations and repairs. Our local presence means we understand the specific crime trends in your neighborhood and can advise on the best perimeter protection strategies.

{/* SEO Content Block: Area Specifics */}

Security Services in {location.suburb}

Whether you live in a freestanding home, a complex, or manage a business premises in {location.suburb}, security is a top priority. Criminals often target properties with visible vulnerabilities such as low walls, dark corners, or outdated alarm systems.

Global Security Solutions offers a comprehensive audit of your property. We don't just sell products; we design a layered security solution that fits your lifestyle and budget.

Our Local Services Include:

  • CCTV Camera Installation
  • Wireless Alarm Systems
  • Electric Fencing COC
  • Gate Motor Repairs
  • Intercom Systems
  • Battery Backups
{/* Sidebar */}
) }

import Link from 'next/link' import { Calendar, ArrowRight, User } from 'lucide-react' import { supabase } from '@/utils/supabase/client' import Image from "next/image"; import { Metadata } from 'next'; export const metadata: Metadata = { title: 'Security Blog | Global Security Solutions', description: 'Read the latest news and tips on home and business security in Cape Town.', } export const revalidate = 60 export default async function BlogIndexPage() { // 1. Fetch from Supabase const { data: dbPosts } = await supabase .from('posts') .select('*') .order('created_at', { ascending: false }) // 2. Format DB posts to match schema const formattedDbPosts = (dbPosts || []).map((p: any) => ({ id: p.id, slug: p.slug, title: p.title, created_at: p.created_at, excerpt: p.excerpt, featured_image: p.cover_image_url || null, author: p.author })) const posts = formattedDbPosts return (
{/* Header */}

Security Insights & News

Expert advice, industry updates, and tips to keep your property safe.

{posts.length === 0 && (

No articles available at the moment. Check back soon!

)}
{posts.map((post: any, i: number) => ( {/* Dog Ear Accent on top of image? Maybe just a corner badge */}
News
{post.featured_image ? ( ) : (
No Image
)}
{new Date(post.created_at).toLocaleDateString('en-ZA', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' })} {post.author || 'Admin'}

{post.title}

{post.excerpt || 'Read the full article for more insights on security solutions.'}

Read Article
))}
) }

import React from 'react' import { Metadata } from 'next' import { CheckCircle2 } from 'lucide-react' import { ContactForm } from '@/components/ContactForm' import seoData from '@/app/data/seoData.json' const pageData = seoData.trustAndSupportPages.find(p => p.page === "Free Security Audit") export const metadata: Metadata = { title: pageData?.title || 'Free Security Audit | Global Security Solutions', description: pageData?.description || 'Book a free security assessment.', } export default function FreeAuditPage() { return (

Free Security Audit

Identify vulnerabilities in your home or business security before they become a problem.

What Our Audit Covers

  • Perimeter weakness analysis (fences, walls, gates)
  • Blind spot checks for CCTV coverage
  • Alarm system functionality and sensor placement
  • Access control and entry point security
  • Lighting and visibility assessment

Our security experts have years of experience in the Cape Town security landscape. We know exactly what criminals look for. Let us help you stay one step ahead.

{/* SEO Content: How It Works */}

How The Audit Process Works

1

Book Your Slot

Fill in the form or call us. We'll schedule a time that suits you.

2

On-Site Assessment

Our technician walks through your property, identifying risks and measuring perimeters.

3

Detailed Proposal

You receive a comprehensive quote and security plan, with no obligation to buy.

) }

import React from 'react' import { Metadata } from 'next' import { Battery, Zap, Sun } from 'lucide-react' import { ContactForm } from '@/components/ContactForm' import seoData from '@/app/data/seoData.json' const pageData = seoData.trustAndSupportPages.find(p => p.page === "Load Shedding Security Solutions") export const metadata: Metadata = { title: pageData?.title || 'Load Shedding Security | Battery Backups Cape Town', description: pageData?.description || 'Keep your security running during power outages.', } export default function LoadSheddingPage() { return (

Load Shedding Security Solutions

Don't let power outages compromise your safety. We keep your systems running 24/7.

Battery Backups

High-capacity batteries for alarms and electric fences to last through 4-hour stages.

Solar Power

Solar panels specifically for electric gates and perimeter security, independent of the grid.

Inverter Integration

Seamless integration of your CCTV and security hub into your existing inverter system.

Why Security Fails During Load Shedding

Standard batteries in alarms and gate motors are designed for occasional outages, not daily cycling. Frequent load shedding drains these batteries faster than they can recharge, leading to system failure and creating opportunities for criminals.

Our Solution

  • Lithium-Iron Phosphate (LiFePO4) batteries with longer lifespans.
  • External power supply units for expanded backup time.
  • Solar charging kits for gate motors and electric fences.
) }

'use client' import Link from 'next/link' import Image from 'next/image' import { CheckCircle2, Star, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react' import { ContactForm } from '@/components/ContactForm' import { BrandCarousel } from '@/components/BrandCarousel' import { ServiceCarousel } from '@/components/ServiceCarousel' import { SectorCarousel } from '@/components/SectorCarousel' import { TestimonialCarousel } from '@/components/TestimonialCarousel' export default function Home() { return (
{/* SECTION 1: HERO HEADER */}
{/* Hero Background Image */}
{/* Hero Content */}

Secure Your World with Confidence

Premium alarms, CCTV, and perimeter protection for Cape Town's finest homes and businesses.

Get a Free Quote Explore Services
{/* Brand Carousel Section */}

Trusted By Leading Brands

{/* Services Overview */}
{/* Decorative background element */}

Comprehensive Security Solutions

From residential homes to industrial estates, we cover all aspects of electronic security with precision and care.

Solutions by Sector

Specialized security strategies tailored for your specific environment.

View All Services
{/* SECTION 4: WHY US - Dark Mode Stats */} {/* SECTION 4: WHY US - Dark Mode Stats */}
10+
Years Experience
Serving Cape Town with pride.
500+
Installations
Homes & businesses secured.
24/7
Support
Always there when you need us.

Why Cape Town Chooses Global Security Solutions.

We don't just install systems; we build trust. Our owner-managed approach ensures that every job meets our high standards of quality and reliability.

  • Owner-Managed

    Personal supervision and accountability on every project.

  • Certified Installers

    Accredited by major brands like PSIRA, Hikvision, and Ajax.

  • Load Shedding Ready

    Systems designed to keep running when the power goes out.

{/* Image / Feature block */}

Our Guarantee

"We believe in doing it right the first time. That's why we offer comprehensive warranties on all hardware and a 12-month workmanship guarantee."

KC

Kyle Cass

Owner, Global Security Solutions

{/* SECTION 5: SOCIAL PROOF */}

What Our Clients Say

{/* Featured Project Teaser */}
Featured Project

Chere Botha School

A comprehensive security upgrade including access control, perimeter security, and high-definition surveillance for a safe learning environment.

View Case Study
{/* SECTION 6: CTA / PRE-FOOTER */}

Ready to Secure Your Property?

Get a free, no-obligation quoted today.

) }

import Image from 'next/image' import Link from 'next/link' import { ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react' import seoData from '../data/seoData.json' const toSlug = (text: string) => { return text .toLowerCase() .replace(/[^\w\s-]/g, '') .replace(/\s+/g, '-') .trim() } const getSectorIcon = (sector: string) => { switch (sector) { case 'Residential Security': return case 'Commercial & Industrial': return
case 'HOA & Estates': return case 'Farms & Agricultural': return case 'Schools & Education': return case 'Retail & Shopping Malls': // Reuse Commercial for Retail if no specific retail icon return default: return } } export const metadata = { title: 'Security Sectors | Global Security Solutions', description: 'Specialized security solutions for residential, commercial, industrial, agricultural, and estate sectors in Cape Town.', } export default function SectorsPage() { const sectors = [ "Residential Security", "Commercial & Industrial", "HOA & Estates", "Farms & Agricultural", "Schools & Education", "Retail & Shopping Malls" ] return (

Sectors We Serve

Tailored security strategies for every environment, from private homes to large-scale industrial operations.

{sectors.map((sector, index) => { const slug = toSlug(sector) // Find matching SEO data for description const seoItem = seoData.sectorSolutions.find(item => item.page === sector || item.title.includes(sector) || (sector.includes('Commercial') && item.page.includes('Commercial')) || (sector.includes('Farms') && item.page.includes('Farm')) || (sector.includes('Estates') && item.page.includes('Estate')) || (sector.includes('Schools') && item.page.includes('Schools')) ) return ( {/* Blue Dog Ear */}
{getSectorIcon(sector)}

{sector}

{seoItem ? seoItem.description.substring(0, 100) + '...' : 'Specialized protection for this sector.'}

View Solutions
) })}
{/* SEO Content Block */}

Tailored Security for Every Environment

Security is not a "one size fits all" solution. The needs of a residential estate differ vastly from those of a high-risk industrial warehouse or a retail store. That's why Global Security Solutions approaches every project with a fresh perspective, conducting a thorough risk assessment based on your specific sector's unique vulnerabilities.

Residential Risks

Focus on perimeter early warning (beams/fencing) and family safety (panic buttons/safe zones).

Commercial Risks

Focus on access control, staff attendance tracking, and high-definition surveillance for liability protection.

) }

import seoData from '@/app/data/seoData.json' import { ContactForm } from '@/components/ContactForm' import { notFound } from 'next/navigation' import Link from 'next/link' import Image from 'next/image' import { ArrowLeft, CheckCircle2 } from 'lucide-react' import { Breadcrumbs } from '@/components/Breadcrumbs' import type { Metadata } from 'next' // Helper to normalize string to slug const toSlug = (text: string) => { return text .toLowerCase() .replace(/[^\w\s-]/g, '') // Remove special chars .replace(/\s+/g, '-') // Replace spaces with - .trim() } // Find service by slug const getService = (slug: string) => { return seoData.primaryServicePages.find(s => toSlug(s.page) === slug) || seoData.sectorSolutions.find(s => toSlug(s.page) === slug) } export async function generateMetadata(props: { params: Promise<{ slug: string }> }): Promise { const params = await props.params const service = getService(params.slug) if (!service) return {} return { title: service.title, description: service.description, } } export default async function ServicePage(props: { params: Promise<{ slug: string }> }) { const params = await props.params const service = getService(params.slug) if (!service) { notFound() } // Generate generic content based on the service title and description for now. // In a real app we'd likely have more specific content or MDX. return (
{/* Main Content */}
{/* @ts-ignore */} {service.iconPath && (
)}

{service.page} Cape Town

{/* @ts-ignore */} {service.longDescription || `Professional ${service.page} installations and repairs in the Western Cape.`}

{/* The Problem */}

Are you concerned about your security?

Without a proper {service.page}, your property leaves gaps that criminals can exploit. Whether it's unmonitored blind spots, easy access points, or outdated hardware, these vulnerabilities put your family or business at risk.

{/* The Solution */}

The Solution: Global Security Solutions

We install high-performance {service.page} designed for the unique challenges of Cape Town. Our systems act as a proactive deterrent, ensuring that threats are detected and stopped before they cause harm.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Remote Mobile Control: Manage your {service.page.toLowerCase()} directly from your smartphone, anywhere in the world.
  • Proactive Alerts: Instant notifications sent to you and our control room if any breach is detected.
  • Load Shedding Backup: Our systems are linked to battery backups to stay online during power cuts.
  • Certified Installation: Fully compliant with insurance and safety regulations in South Africa.
{/* SEO Content Block: FAQ */}

Frequently Asked Questions

How long does installation take?

Most residential installations are completed within 1-2 days. Larger commercial projects may take longer depending on complexity.

Do you offer warranties?

Yes, we provide a 1-year workmanship guarantee and full manufacturer warranties on all hardware (Hikvision, IDS, Paradox, etc.).

Can I view my cameras on my phone?

Absolutely. All our modern CCTV and alarm systems can be linked to a mobile app for remote viewing and control.

Brands We Use

We don't cut corners on hardware. For {service.page}, we trust only the industry leaders like Hikvision, IDS, Paradox, and Nemtek to ensure reliability when you need it most.

{/* Sidebar */}
) }
